argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lsslvec.x | |- X = ( W |`s U ) |
| 2 |  | lsslvec.s | |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) |
| 3 |  | #P_lveclmod | |- ( W e. LVec -> W e. LMod ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_lsslmod | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ U e. S ) -> X e. LMod ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( W e. LVec /\ U e. S ) -> X e. LMod ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` W ) = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 7 | 1, 6 | #P_resssca | |- ( U e. S -> ( Scalar ` W ) = ( Scalar ` X ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( W e. LVec /\ U e. S ) -> ( Scalar ` W ) = ( Scalar ` X ) ) |
| 9 | 6 | #P_lvecdrng | |- ( W e. LVec -> ( Scalar ` W ) e. DivRing ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( W e. LVec /\ U e. S ) -> ( Scalar ` W ) e. DivRing ) |
| 11 | 8, 10 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( ( W e. LVec /\ U e. S ) -> ( Scalar ` X ) e. DivRing ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` X ) = ( Scalar ` X ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_islvec | |- ( X e. LVec <-> ( X e. LMod /\ ( Scalar ` X ) e. DivRing ) ) |
| 14 | 5, 11, 13 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ( W e. LVec /\ U e. S ) -> X e. LVec ) |
